data.text: E haga manawa gee idimaa gu deai digau i Jerusalem ai,
Mee e dangidangi i di boo hagatau,
Digau Judah guu hula gi daha mo nadau gowaa donu,
Digau e hula gi di Hale Daumaha ai
Ono hagadaumee gu aali,
Di madamada o Jerusalem gu hagalee.
Jerusalem gu ongeonge dolomeenei,
Dono hagalaamua gu hagalee,
Ono gulugulua gu modongoohia hagammaa,
Ono hagadaumee gu gaiaa ono goloo hagalabagau huogodoo.
Ana daangada gu tangitangi mo di manawa gee
Mee e dangidangi gi digau ala e hula laalaa i dono baahi boloo,
“Mee ne hagau eia dana ahi i di langi,
“Mee gu hagailongo ogu huaidu huogodoo,
“Dimaadua gu gadagada gi agu gau dauwa ala koia e maaloo,
“Deenei tadinga ogu golomada ala e halidangi.
“Au guu holo ogu lima gi daha,
“Gei Dimaadua le e donu,
“Au gu gahigahi ogu ihoo,
“Meenei Dimaadua, mmada mai gi dogu mmae huoloo,
“Hagalongo mai gi dogu lee manawa gee,
“Haga huaidu ina digaula
